mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO HOSPITAL.DOCTOR( "id", "name", "pid", "uuid", "sex", "birthday", "school", "degree", "tel", "address", "email", "job", "remark", "description", "hiredate", "tag","recommended","status", "create_time" ) VALUES ( NEXT VALUE FOR HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_SEQUENCE, #{name}, #{pid}, #{uuid}, #{sex}, TO_DATE('${birthday}'), #{school}, #{degree}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{email}, #{job}, #{remark}, #{description}, #{hiredate}, #{tag}, ${recommended}, ${status}, NOW() )
